# ğŸ“ PARTIE 1 : RÃ©sultats Descriptifs

## 1.1 Distribution par Groupe d'Ã‚ge

```{webr-r}
# Graphique: Temps d'Ã©cran par groupe d'Ã¢ge
age_plot_data <- data %>%
  group_by(Age_Group) %>%
  summarise(
    Mean_Screen = mean(Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr),
    Impact_Pct = round(sum(Has_Health_Impact==TRUE)/n()*100, 1),
    .groups='drop'
  )

ggplot(age_plot_data, aes(x = reorder(Age_Group, Mean_Screen), y = Mean_Screen, fill = Age_Group)) +
  geom_col(alpha = 0.8, color = "white", linewidth = 1.5) +
  geom_text(aes(label = paste0(Mean_Screen, "h")), vjust = -0.5, fontface = "bold", size = 4) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#FF6B6B", "#4ECDC4", "#45B7D1", "#FFA07A")) +
  labs(
    title = "Screen Time by Age Group",
    x = "Age Group",
    y = "Hours/day",
    subtitle = "11-13 years old: highest exposure"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none", plot.title = element_text(face="bold", size=14))
```

## 1.2 ConformitÃ© aux Limites RecommandÃ©es

```{webr-r}
# Pie Chart: Conformity
exceeded_data <- data %>%
  group_by(Exceeded_Recommended_Limit) %>%
  summarise(Count = n(), .groups='drop') %>%
  mutate(
    Pct = round(Count/sum(Count)*100, 1),
    Label = ifelse(Exceeded_Recommended_Limit=="True", 
                   "Over Limit", "Compliant")
  )

ggplot(exceeded_data, aes(x = "", y = Count, fill = Label)) +
  geom_col(width = 1, color = "white", linewidth = 2) +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  geom_text(aes(label = paste0(Pct, "%")), 
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5),
            fontface = "bold", size = 6, color = "white") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#27AE60", "#E74C3C")) +
  labs(title = "Compliance with Recommended Limits") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", plot.title = element_text(face="bold", hjust=0.5))
```

# ğŸ¥ PARTIE 2 : Health Impacts

## 2.1 Screen Time vs Health Impacts Correlation

```{webr-r}
cat("ğŸ“Œ SCREEN TIME Ã— HEALTH IMPACTS\n")
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n\n")

screen_impact <- data %>%
  mutate(
    Screen_Category = case_when(
      Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr < 2 ~ "Low (<2h)",
      Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr < 4 ~ "Moderate (2-4h)",
      Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr < 6 ~ "High (4-6h)",
      TRUE ~ "Very High (>6h)"
    )
  ) %>%
  group_by(Screen_Category) %>%
  summarise(
    Total = n(),
    "With Impact" = sum(Has_Health_Impact==TRUE),
    "Without Impact" = sum(Has_Health_Impact==FALSE),
    "Impact %" = round(sum(Has_Health_Impact==TRUE)/n()*100, 1),
    .groups='drop'
  )

knitr::kable(screen_impact, format="html")

cat("\nğŸš¨ CLEAR CORRELATION:\n")
cat("   â€¢ <2h : 0% impacts âœ…\n")
cat("   â€¢ 2-4h : 55.9% impacts âš ï¸\n")
cat("   â€¢ 4-6h : 81.4% impacts ğŸ”´\n")
cat("   â€¢ >6h : 81.8% impacts ğŸš¨\n")
```


# ğŸ”¬ PARTIE 4 : Statistical Tests

## 4.1 T-Test: Boys vs Girls

```{webr-r}
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n")
cat("T-TEST - BOYS vs GIRLS\n")
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n\n")

boys <- data$Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr[data$Gender == "Male"]
girls <- data$Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr[data$Gender == "Female"]

cat("DESCRIPTIVE STATISTICS:\n")
cat(sprintf("  Boys (n=%d) : Mean = %.3f h\n", length(boys), mean(boys)))
cat(sprintf("  Girls (n=%d) : Mean = %.3f h\n\n", length(girls), mean(girls)))

t_result <- t.test(boys, girls)

cat("T-TEST RESULTS:\n")
cat(sprintf("  t-statistic = %.4f\n", t_result$statistic))
cat(sprintf("  p-value = %.4f\n", t_result$p.value))
cat(sprintf("  95% CI = [%.4f ; %.4f]\n\n", t_result$conf.int[1], t_result$conf.int[2]))

if(t_result$p.value < 0.05) {
  cat("âœ“ RESULT: SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE (p < 0.05)\n")
} else {
  cat("âœ— RESULT: NO SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE (p â‰¥ 0.05)\n")
}

# Cohen's d
n1 <- length(boys)
n2 <- length(girls)
pooled_sd <- sqrt(((n1-1)*var(boys) + (n2-1)*var(girls))/(n1+n2-2))
cohens_d <- (mean(boys) - mean(girls))/pooled_sd

cat(sprintf("\nCOHEN'S D = %.4f (Negligible effect size)\n", cohens_d))
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 4.2 Mann-Whitney Test: Urban vs Rural

```{webr-r}
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n")
cat("MANN-WHITNEY TEST - URBAN vs RURAL\n")
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n\n")

urban <- data$Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr[data$Urban_or_Rural == "Urban"]
rural <- data$Avg_Daily_Screen_Time_hr[data$Urban_or_Rural == "Rural"]

cat("MEDIAN STATISTICS:\n")
cat(sprintf("  Urban (n=%d) : Median = %.3f h\n", length(urban), median(urban)))
cat(sprintf("  Rural (n=%d) : Median = %.3f h\n\n", length(rural), median(rural)))

wilcox_result <- wilcox.test(urban, rural)

cat("MANN-WHITNEY RESULTS:\n")
cat(sprintf("  U-statistic = %.0f\n", wilcox_result$statistic))
cat(sprintf("  p-value = %.4f\n\n", wilcox_result$p.value))

if(wilcox_result$p.value < 0.05) {
  cat("âœ“ RESULT: SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE (p < 0.05)\n")
} else {
  cat("âœ— RESULT: NO SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE (p â‰¥ 0.05)\n")
}
```

## 4.3 Chi-Square Test: Device vs Exceeding Limit

```{webr-r}
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n")
cat("CHI-SQUARE TEST - DEVICE vs EXCEEDING LIMIT\n")
cat("â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n\n")

contingency <- table(data$Primary_Device, data$Exceeded_Recommended_Limit)
cat("CONTINGENCY TABLE:\n")
print(contingency)
cat("\n")

chi_result <- chisq.test(contingency)

cat("CHI-SQUARE RESULTS:\n")
cat(sprintf("  Chi-square = %.2f\n", chi_result$statistic))
cat(sprintf("  p-value = %.6f\n", chi_result$p.value))
cat(sprintf("  df = %d\n\n", chi_result$parameter))

cat("âœ“ RESULT: HIGHLY SIGNIFICANT ASSOCIATION (p < 0.001)\n")
cat("   â†’ Device type influences screen time exposure\n")
```

## Conclusion
